Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Class ClientMessageObserverHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.ClientMessageObserverHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<CommunicationMessage>
public class ClientMessageObserverHandler extends Object implements Observer<CommunicationMessage>
Observer of all the incoming messages, client side.

This object is an observer of all the incoming messages which arrive to the client. When a new message arrives at the client, than the client itself notifies the new message to this object which handles it by checking its id and then making the proper action onto the UI.

See Also:

  • Method Details

    • updateBoardMessage

      public void updateBoardMessage(GameBoard board)
      Updates the board client side by updating the user interface with the new changes. Moreover, it handles the state of the FSM which is keeping track of the game status client side.
      Parameters:
      board - the new board which has arrived from the server. It will substitute the previous one.

    • update

      public void update(CommunicationMessage message)
      Based on the message received by the client and its id, it lets a new thread performing the proper action on the user interface.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer<CommunicationMessage>
      Parameters:
      message - the message received from the server which has been notified.

    • isActionSent

      public boolean isActionSent()
      Checks whether an action has just been sent to the server by the client or not.

      Whenever the clients receives a new update from the server the actionSent attribute gets set to false.

      Returns:
      true if an action has been just sent to the server, otherwise false.

    • setActionSent

      public void setActionSent(boolean actionSent)
      Sets the given value to the actionSent attribute.
      Parameters:
      actionSent - the new value to set to actionSent attribute.
